content:
I am a PhD student in the Department of Statistics at University of Michigan. My current research interest includes transfer learning, high-dimensial statistics, algorithmic fairness, though I’m always interested to learn about new topics. There are so many things one can learn in a life-time.
On a personal note I love football, cycling, and cooking.
summary: I am a PhD student in the Department of Statistics at University of Michigan. My current research interest includes transfer learning, high-dimensial statistics, algorithmic fairness, though I’m always interested to learn about new topics.
title: Subha Maity
